entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Use value semantics for System.Collections.Immutable types #59901
  • [API Proposal]: System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapFilter #59900
  • IEnumerable<T> is defaulted to an empty array during DI resolution #59899
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json serialization callback context #59892

Closed

  • JIT: libraries PGO runtime assert #59668
    7.0.0
  • JIT: a number of OSR stress tests failing with an assert #59785
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add flag to include all intermediate certificates #59898
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Use `IntegralRange` in `fgOptimizeCast` #59897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399785 #59896
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399642 #59893
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399596 #59891
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fallback to x64 directory if running x64 process on win-arm64 apphost #59890
    area-Host
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399475 #59889
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399414 #59888
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1399313 #59887
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change loop cloning conditions codegen #59886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix IDE0008 in DllImportGenerator and Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration #59885
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Merged

  • Clean up fix for single-reg returned normalize-on-load vars #59645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix resolveVirtualMethodHelper #59742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize DateTime.Equals #59857
    area-System.Runtime
  • Move runtime rolling builds to run twice a day on main #59884
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move MakeReproPackage logic to a shared location #59796
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make libraries tests use the same config as the matching libraries build. #59867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run wasm aot, wbt tests on windows #59479
    area-Build-mono
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59869
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable Crossgen for FreeBSD, now that it is actually implemented. #59853
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Swap using the provided indexes #55331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Diagnostics reported from a source generator should not require rebuilding project(s) to be updated and should display red/green squiggles at the location of the diagnostic #56928
  • Analyzer to report arrays that can be converted to ImmutableArray<T> #56927
  • Potential bug with Remove Unused Variable #56924

Closed

  • Consider adding Attribute extension F1 shortcut keys in c#，Link to custom document web site #56503
    Backlog
  • Add fully qualified Using statement #56505
    Backlog
  • C# Naming style rules suggest adding regular matches #56508
    Backlog
  • Calling interpolated string handler method on ref parameter (or ref local) causes compilation error #56624
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix a typo #56925
    Area-IDE, Next
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE, UX Review Requested, Next
  • Separate IDE and editorconfig formatting options #56888
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56903
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56923
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Obsolete the legacy persistence service. #56912
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #56931
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56930
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to a singleton storage service per process, instead of per workspace. #56916
    Area-IDE
  • Update support for finding CodeLens references from source generated files #53043
    Area-IDE
  • String splitter refactoring #56889
    Area-IDE
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow 'var' as an explicit lambda expression return type #56911
    Area-Compilers, 17.1

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linux: RBAC claims resolution hangs if nested groups have circular dependencies #37225
  • Startup improvement: endpoint, mapaction, mapaction #37223
  • Startup regression: connectionclosehttps #37222
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #37221
  • Should ConfigureWebDefaults be removed from CreateDefaultBuilder? #37219
  • Blazor wasm: unable to reference enums in razor page and namespace not visible #37218
  • Blazor HeadContent need to use with ServerPrerendered #37216
  • Better SignalR documentation for authentication #37214
  • Blazor PointerEventArgs.Button always -1 with svg #37213
  • Single file build time regression: json #37211
  • Perf regression: json_nodejs, plaintext_nodejs #37210
  • Problem with razor code generation with named tuples #37209
  • Blazor WASM (.NET6) does not allow AAD Authentication when Deployed to Azure Web app #37206

Closed

  • [Blazor] The `onloadstart` event does not work for <img /> #29582
    Discussions
  • Startup improvement: json #37086
  • Startup regression: json #37173
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #37172
  • Minimal Api doesn't work and throw Exception when project run #37179
  • Failed to load resources _framework/dotnet.timezones.blat and _framework/icudt_EFIGS.dat , server returns 404. #37138
  • VS LSP: Check for CancellationToken cancellation after async methods #22287
    Razor.Tooling
  • Error when trying to rename a property used in a blazor component #20515
    Razor.Tooling
  • Better on typing completion triggers #14445
    Razor.Tooling
  • [Tooling] Unskip C# excerpt tests #7768
    Backlog
  • HTML completions should be able to be auto-completed by `>` #14303
    Razor.Tooling
  • Cannot drag & drop .razor/.cshtml files into Codespaces #23910
    Razor.Tooling
  • Codespaces HTML Hovers don't work until changes made in file #23905
    Razor.Tooling
  • Hovering over a component parameter shows "<para>" XML elements for documentation #24550
    Razor.Tooling
  • Be able to set some resources of Blazor components in different assemblies. #34900
    Discussions
  • 6.0 docs: HTTP/3 in ASP.NET Core #26415
    6.0-rc2
  • Renaming to existing tracked file name under git causes error #26613
    Razor.Tooling
  • Autocompletion deletes code #31616
    Fixed by LSP-ification
  • Razor Tooling shows bogus warning for nested 'Frame' tag "Element requires end tag" / "missing matching start tag" #27450
    Fixed by LSP-ification
  • Razor: With C#, typing a double equal to check if a variable is equal to something, causes razor to corrupt the code #22510
    Fixed by LSP-ification
  • Adding a Blazor Component as link causes crashes and RZ10012 error #23402
    Fixed by LSP-ification
  • Intellisense and syntax highlighting in Blazor app stops working for open files after publishing #26791
    Fixed by LSP-ification
  • [Blazor Server] Renaming Blazor component throws exception and breaks intellisense #28782
    Fixed by LSP-ification

PullRequests

Created

  • Honoring error information on OAuth Exchange Code #37224
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Fixed translation error: "disable OpenApi support" issue #37202 #37220
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/3.1] Clear layout directories before copies #37208
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Cleanup YAML parameters and settings #37186
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Normalize the content root and improve errors (#36990) #37226
    area-runtime
  • Linux: Fix nested group resolution for RBAC claims #35279
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Try out helix retry #37137
    area-infrastructure
  • Add source-index build job to pipeline #37028
    area-infrastructure
  • Avoid inferring RequiredAttribute for properties of types in the fram… #37145
    area-mvc
  • Fix ambiguous BindAsync error #37142
    area-web-frameworks
  • Don't allow modifying WebRootPath after initialization #37147
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add additional types to SuppressChildValidationMetadataProvider (#37150) #37188
    area-mvc
  • Use Authorization header in WebSockets on Node #37205
    area-signalr
  • Update selenium-standalone #37184
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
